properties.entry: select saap.* from sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_real_product_rel srpr where saap.account_id = srpr.account_id and saap.sku = srpr.sku and saap.status = 'Y' and srpr.real_id = '{@#realId#}'

SELECT soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU AS LISTING_SKU , COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 7 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi, sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND soi.Seller_SKU = srpr.SKU AND srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE) GROUP BY soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU UNION SELECT soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU AS LISTING_SKU , COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 14 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi, sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND soi.Seller_SKU = srpr.SKU AND srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE) GROUP BY soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU UNION SELECT soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU AS LISTING_SKU , COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 30 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi, sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND soi.Seller_SKU = srpr.SKU AND srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE) GROUP BY soi.ACCOUNT_ID,soi.Seller_SKU

SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 7 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and soi.Seller_SKU = '{@#listingSku#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE) UNION SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 14 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and soi.Seller_SKU = '{@#listingSku#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE) UNION SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT , 30 AS TYPE FROM sc_order_item soi WHERE soi.ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and soi.Seller_SKU = '{@#listingSku#}' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(soi.PURCHASE_DATE)

SELECT saap.ACCOUNT_ID, saap.SKU, saap.FULFILLMENT_CHANNEL, saap.ASIN, saap.LOWEST_PRICE, saap.LOWEST_FBA_PRICE, saa.name as ACCOUNT_NAME, saa.TRANSFER_WH_PRICE, saa.FBC_ORDER_RATE, saa.FBM_ORDER_RATE, spca.COMMISSION_RATIO , '' as TOTAL_COST, '' as TRANSFER_COST, '' as LOGISTICS_COST , saa.FEE_RATIO, spca.FBA_COST as _FBA_COST, spca.COMMISSION_LOWLIMIT, spca.VARIABLE_CLOSING_FEE, saa.INVENTORY_CENTER_FEE, spcd.OTHER_COST, srp.ID as REAL_ID, srp.WEIGHT, srp.PACKAGE_WEIGHT, srp.LENGTH, srp.WIDTH, srp.HEIGHT, (select ser.EXCHANGE_RATE from sc_exchange_rate ser where ser.id = saa.EXCHANGE_ID ) as EXCHANGE_RATE FROM sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_amazon_account saa, sc_real_product srp , sc_real_product_rel srpr LEFT JOIN sc_product_cost_details spcd ON spcd.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND spcd.LISTING_SKU = srpr.SKU left join sc_product_cost_asin spca on spca.asin = saap.asin WHERE saap.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND saap.SKU = srpr.SKU and saa.id = saap.account_id and srp.id = srpr.real_id and srpr.account_id = '{@#accountId#}' and srpr.sku = '{@#listingSku#}'

SELECT spc.ASIN, spcd.TYPE, spcd.SELLER_COST as TOTAL_PRICE, '' as TOTAL_COST , '' as TRANSFER_COST, '' as FEE , '' as COMMISSION_FEE , '' as LOGISTICS_COST , '' as INVENTORY_CENTER_FEE, spca.FBA_COST , spca.COMMISSION_RATIO , spca.FBA_COST AS _FBA_COST, spca.COMMISSION_LOWLIMIT, spca.VARIABLE_CLOSING_FEE, spcd.OTHER_COST, '' AS WEIGHT, '' AS PACKAGE_WEIGHT, '6.04' as EXCHANGE_RATE FROM ( sc_product_cost spc, sc_product_cost_details spcd, sc_product_developer spd ) LEFT JOIN sc_product_cost_asin spca ON spca.ASIN = spc.ASIN WHERE spc.ID = spcd.COST_ID AND spc.ASIN = spd.ASIN and spc.ASIN = '{@#asin#}'

SELECT saap.ACCOUNT_ID, saap.SKU, saap.FULFILLMENT_CHANNEL, saap.ASIN, saap.LOWEST_PRICE, saap.LOWEST_FBA_PRICE, saa.name as ACCOUNT_NAME, saa.TRANSFER_WH_PRICE, saa.FBC_ORDER_RATE, saa.FBM_ORDER_RATE, '' as TOTAL_COST, '' as TRANSFER_COST, '' as LOGISTICS_COST , saa.FEE_RATIO, spca.COMMISSION_RATIO , spca.FBA_COST as _FBA_COST, spca.COMMISSION_LOWLIMIT, spca.VARIABLE_CLOSING_FEE, spcd.OTHER_COST, saa.INVENTORY_CENTER_FEE, srp.ID as REAL_ID, srp.WEIGHT, srp.PACKAGE_WEIGHT, srp.LENGTH, srp.WIDTH, srp.HEIGHT, (select ser.EXCHANGE_RATE from sc_exchange_rate ser where ser.id = saa.EXCHANGE_ID ) as EXCHANGE_RATE FROM ( sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_amazon_account saa, sc_real_product srp , sc_real_product_rel srpr ) LEFT JOIN sc_product_cost_details spcd ON spcd.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND spcd.LISTING_SKU = srpr.SKU left join sc_product_cost_asin spca on saap.asin = spca.asin WHERE saap.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND saap.SKU = srpr.SKU and saa.id = saap.account_id and srp.id = srpr.real_id and srpr.real_id = '{@#realId#}' {@ and saap.account_id = '#accountId#'} {@ and saap.sku = '#listingSku#'}

SELECT saap.ACCOUNT_ID, saap.SKU, saap.FULFILLMENT_CHANNEL, saap.ASIN, saap.LOWEST_PRICE, saap.LOWEST_FBA_PRICE, saa.name as ACCOUNT_NAME, saa.TRANSFER_WH_PRICE, saa.FBC_ORDER_RATE, saa.FBM_ORDER_RATE, spca.COMMISSION_RATIO , '' as TOTAL_COST, '' as TRANSFER_COST, '' as LOGISTICS_COST , saa.FEE_RATIO, spca.FBA_COST as _FBA_COST, spca.COMMISSION_LOWLIMIT, spca.VARIABLE_CLOSING_FEE, saa.INVENTORY_CENTER_FEE, spcd.OTHER_COST, srp.ID as REAL_ID, srp.WEIGHT, srp.PACKAGE_WEIGHT, srp.LENGTH, srp.WIDTH, srp.HEIGHT, (select ser.EXCHANGE_RATE from sc_exchange_rate ser where ser.id = saa.EXCHANGE_ID ) as EXCHANGE_RATE FROM sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_amazon_account saa, sc_real_product srp , sc_real_product_rel srpr LEFT JOIN sc_product_cost_details spcd ON spcd.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND spcd.LISTING_SKU = srpr.SKU left join sc_product_cost_asin spca on spca.asin = saap.asin WHERE saap.ACCOUNT_ID = srpr.ACCOUNT_ID AND saap.SKU = srpr.SKU and saa.id = saap.account_id and srp.id = srpr.real_id and saap.account_id = {@ '#accountId#'} and saap.sku = {@ '#listingSku#'}
